name: Micron Technology, Inc.
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. is a leading American producer of computer memory and data storage solutions, including DRAM, NAND, and NOR flash memory, as well as solid-state drives. Headquartered in Boise, Idaho, and founded in 1978, Micron serves global markets through its Micron and Crucial brands, driving innovation in AI, data centers, and edge computing.
